page.title: 09LOCAL SCHOOLS IN HORBURY
page.content: Childrens first experience of 'schooling' may be at a Playschool.These are run on a voluntary basis and are not connected to the state system. They enter the state system,if they wish,once they are three.They attend on a part time basis,either mornings or afternoons.Nursery education is not compulsory,some areas do not have Nursery Schools. Compulsory education begins at 5.In Horbury and Ossett the children enter Infant Schools.At seven they enter the Junior part of their education,at eleven they transfer to a Secondary School.They must remain at school until they are 16. In other areas the age of transfer may vary.
